function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global epidemic data collection may have involved exposure to the virus.","Impact":"Potential risk of transmission of COVID-19 to individuals involved in data collection.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to personal protective equipment (PPE) protocols and regular testing for COVID-19.","Technologies":"Use of advanced PPE, testing kits, and contact tracing technology.","People":"Medical staff, researchers, and data collectors.","Owner":"Health organizations and research institutions."},{"Description":"Use of public data repositories for COVID-19 information may lead to exposure to malware or cyber threats.","Impact":"Compromised data integrity, privacy breaches, and potential spread of misinformation.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust cybersecurity measures, regular security audits, and user education on data security best practices.","Technologies":"Firewalls, encryption, secure data transmission protocols, and malware detection software.","People":"Researchers, data analysts, and individuals accessing the data repositories.","Owner":"Data repository administrators, cybersecurity experts, and IT professionals."}]}
